column1: NOTE: Please use the rendered version of this file.
{%-assign paths = ''%}{%for path in file.Full_Path%}{%assign paths = paths | append:path.Path%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign paths = paths | append:'

{%-assign detections = ''%}{%for detection in file.Detection%}{%assign detections = detections | append:detection.first[0] | append:": " | append:detection.first[1]%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign detections = detections | append:'
{%-assign resources = ''%}{%for resource in file.Resources%}{%assign resources = resources | append:resource.Link%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign resources = resources | append:'
{%-assign atomic_tests = ''%}{%for resource in file.AtomicTests%}{%assign atomic_tests = atomic_tests | append:resource%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign atomic_tests = atomic_tests | append:'

{%-assign acknowledgements = ''%}{%for acknowledgement in file.Acknowledgement%}{%assign acknowledgements = acknowledgements | append:acknowledgement.Person%}{%if acknowledgement.Handle != null and acknowledgement.Handle != ""%}{%assign acknowledgements = acknowledgements | append:' (' | append:acknowledgement.Handle | append:')'%}{%endif%}{%unless forloop.last%}{%assign acknowledgements = acknowledgements | append:'
{%-assign tags = ''|split:''-%}{%-for tag_items in command.Tags-%}{%-for tag_item in tag_items-%}{%-assign tag=tag_item | join:':' |replace:'"'
